text: ara smarana karuna, yakhana allah‌ nabidera angikara niyechilena [1] ye, ami tomaderake kitaba o hikamata ya kichu diyechi; tarapara tomadera kache ya ache tara satyayanakarirupe yakhana ekajana rasula asabe– takhana tomara abasya'i tara prati imana anabe ebam take sahayya karabe.’ Tini balalena, ‘tomara ki sbikara karale ebam era upara amara angikara ki tomara grahana karale?’ Tara balala, ‘amara sbikara karalama’. Tini balalena, ‘tabe tomara saksi thaka ebam ami'o tomadera sathe saksi ra'ilama [2].’
